about_the_game: Discover the thrill of the Alaskan wilderness in this exclusive one hour demo. Test your skills in a driving simulator that puts you in the heart of the action, as you take on the risks and rewards of becoming an Alaskan trucking legend. Navigate perilous routes, tackle on-the-spot repairs, and embrace the survival elements that make every mile an adventure.

name: Alaskan Road Truckers Demo
short_description: Experience the ultimate trucker challenge in a special one hour demo of the definitive Alaskan life simulator. Be the master of your own destiny as you take jobs, transport cargo and experience a sense of freedom on foot and in your cab.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
